availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Indiana native. Married Mary Ann Billiter Biddle. Laborer in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 283. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Unknown District, p. 979.
Find A Grave, "Isaac Biddle (1820 - 1885)," Memorial #118766598, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=118766598&ref=acom (accessed 14 March 14, 2017).
